sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_62500_mealplan_recipe"> <x_62500_mealplan_recipe action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>true</active> <cook_time>1970-01-01 00:30:00</cook_time> <cooking_instructions>1. Heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat. 2. Add chopped onion, minced garlic, minced ginger, and chopped green chili. Cook until onions are translucent. 3. Add chopped tomatoes and cook until soft. 4. Stir in garam masala, turmeric powder, cumin powder, and coriander powder. Cook for 2-3. 5. Add chicken thighs and cook until browned. 6. Add water as needed to achieve desired consistency. 7. Simmer for 20-25, until chicken is cooked through and sauce is thickened. 8. Garnish with fresh coriander and serve hot with rice or naan.</cooking_instructions> <cuisine display_value="Indian">8f495a179791021069a3b6fce053afcf</cuisine> <diet/> <effort display_value="Moderate">bee0a76e9730021069a3b6fce053af3e</effort> <image/> <ingredients/> <meal_type display_value="Dinner">ca8516df9751021069a3b6fce053afdf</meal_type> <name>Chicken Curry</name> <nutrition>Calories: 350, Protein: 25g, Fat: 20g, Carbs: 15g</nutrition> <owned_by display_value="MP Admin">cbb877e697b0021069a3b6fce053af41</owned_by> <pre_cook>false</pre_cook> <prep_instructions>1. Chop onion, tomato, garlic, ginger, and green chili.</prep_instructions> <prep_required>false</prep_required> <prep_time>1970-01-01 00:20:00</prep_time> <serving>2</serving> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2024-04-07 01:56:01</sys_created_on> <sys_id>465917d797d5021069a3b6fce053afd7</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-05-01 06:39:10</sys_updated_on> <time_of_day/> </x_62500_mealplan_recipe> </record_update>
